content: Yingquan ZhaoSkip to main contentSkip to navigationYingquan Zhao (赵 英全) Last updated : 2025.6Software Analysis and Intelligence Lab (SAIL Lab)College of Intelligence and Computing，Tianjin UniversityEmail: zhaoyingquan [AT] tju [DOT] edu [DOT] cnAddress: Building #55, Tianjin University, No. 135 Yaguan Road, Jinnan District, Tianjin, 300350I am currently an Associate Professor (Tenure-Track) at the College of Intelligence and Computing, Tianjin University. I received my PhD’s degree in 2025 from Tianjin University supervised by Prof. Zan Wang and Prof. Junjie Chen. My research interests: Software Testing and Software Analytics.[Github]  [Google Scholar]  [Dblp]Publications  († : first student author, * : corresponding author.)Exploring JVM Garbage Collector
